name: VR Catgirl
description:
This is a VR casual game with shooting theme, with a relaxed and happy style. The player needs to control the drone to shoot at the cat’s tail until the cat’s blood tank becomes empty. During the shooting process, when the cat girl leaves the portal, the player needs to control the drone to follow the cat girl to switch to a new scene to continue shooting, until the cat girl disappears and the mission ends. Players can overlook castles, residential buildings, harbors and other landscapes during the flight shooting process, which also has a tour function.

Instructions:
Left handle touchpad: control the flight direction;
Menu keys on the left and right handles: call out the menu;
Right handle touchpad: short sprint
Under the touchpad of the right handle: slow down
Right handle trigger: fire
Right handle grip button: switch firepower
The right handle controls the shooting direction
